"age" - a shoe that transforms into a high-heeled sandal with the press of a button. This shoe is perfect for those who want to add some height and elegance to their outfit without compromising on comfort.
"SoleMate" - a smart shoe that tracks your footsteps and provides real-time feedback on your gait, helping you improve your posture and reduce the risk of injury.
"Flex" - a shoe that bends and molds to the shape of your feet, providing customized support and comfort. This shoe is perfect for those with flat feet or who suffer from foot pain.
"Morpho" - a shoe that changes color based on your mood or surroundings. This shoe is perfect for those who want to add a pop of color to their outfit or who want to blend in with their surroundings.

"age" - a shoe that uses 3D printing technology to create a custom-fit shoe with intricate designs and patterns. This shoe is perfect for those who want a one-of-a-kind shoe that is both functional and stylish.
